solution_line_template: Each basket contains an average of {average_fruits_per_basket} fruits so the {num_baskets} baskets in all contain {average_fruits_per_basket}*{num_baskets} = <<{average_fruits_per_basket}*{num_baskets}={total_fruits}>>{total_fruits} fruits
The number of apples, mangoes, peaches and pears is {apples}+{mangoes}+{peaches}+{pears} = <<{apples}+{mangoes}+{peaches}+{pears}={sum_other_fruits}>>{sum_other_fruits}
The remaining fruits are bananas and they are {total_fruits}-{sum_other_fruits} = <<{total_fruits}-{sum_other_fruits}={bananas_in_basket_e}>>{bananas_in_basket_e} in number
